website_summaries.verdict: Great for offices with limited floor space, this pricier model boasts intricate carvings and ample storage.
pros: Tall rather than wide, the case stores a full library on seven shelves, five of which adjust in height
This solid unit is made from real wood embellished with elegant scroll work, justifying its higher price tag
cons: Though owners love the decorative details, the trim does limit the height of the top shelf

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine cabinet. My 2 units arrived on time in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine cabinet. My 2 units arrived on time in heavy cartons, protected so the units arrived without a mark on them. Can't even say that about some local vendors. The shelves are bolted in so they don't shift in shipment, but it's done so once they're released you can't tell. The 2 units I ordered were the exact color as I expected. They're sturdy, well built, a nice addition to my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking Independently

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcases!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these units for our library. They come partially pre-assembled (shelves are held together at the bottom of the unit) so putting it up was breeze. The bookcases are well made, solid, and nicely finished. While the units are not a full hardwood, they do have some hardwood pieces, hardwood veneers, and the particle boards used in cores are very nice density. We expect the units to last decades and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Greg S (Wildabeyst)

customer_reviews.title: Good product but received damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Received with two holes in the backside of the shelf that are visible from the front. Interestingly, the packing itself was not damaged. So, one would not know until opened. The manufacturer was courteous and asked to reach out to Amazon for this problem. I gave up since who would send such a big thing back and what is the guarantee that the next one will not be damaged. Issue is that the delivery guys do not open and check causing this unfortunate situation.
customer_reviews.author: Meister

customer_reviews.title: Shop around before you spend the money.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. If you opt for the deliery option, don't expect much. They drop it in the room you want and bail. They don't open up the box and certainly do not put it together. I would shop around at the local furniture stores before paying for this bookcase. If you can't find something you like, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Brice E. Graber

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf is a good deal for the money. It arrives in a sturdy cardboard box. I had it delivered to a room in my apartment. They delivered to the location I specified but did not unpack it. Getting it out of the box is no easy task. Some assembly is required. Most of the shelves have to be installed. They do provide all the hardware, just be sure you don’t lose any mounting screws they are small and it is easy to lose them. Once unpacked and assembled it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Suckenik

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this beautiful bookcase had a chunk of wood missing
customer_reviews.text: We eagerly awaited the arrival of this bookcase. It came assembled except the customer had to put in the shelves which was fine. It wasn't until we loaded up the entire case with books that we noticed a large chunk of wood missing on the bottom front of the piece. We didn't initially see it because we put the bookcase in a dark corner. I would have rated this "Perfect" if not for the missing piece. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase meets all my needs. It is a great looking piece of furniture and I just love the detailing on the trim. I have a lot of books, so having a steady bookcase was a must, and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and Workmanship!
customer_reviews.text: VERY well Made! Is a perfect addition to My home library! No Assembly, Fantastic! Would reccomend to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: HIGHLANDER

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf is beautiful & perfect. It’s sturdy & having adjustable shelves is great for my larger text books. It matches my other furniture quite well despite being from a different manufacturer. There were a couple of shelves damaged in transport & the company replaced them very quickly. I would definitely purchase another item from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie R.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sturdy and pre-assembled
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sturdy and pre-assembled! These shelves are elegant and will fit right in with antiques or new furniture. I bought one then had to have another one. The extra height is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Needed another one.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these book cases iin my office and bought this fourth one when I needed extra capacity. Well made, solid, and classic design.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bookshelves and they aligned perfectly together. Very sturdy, well made and look beautiful. Easy to assemble and secure to the wall studs.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Parker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: This product appears as described! Very high quality wood and simple to assemble. If you want to avoid the hassle you can add the S&H and they will deliver it to the desired room. Was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Keekaroo

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcases
customer_reviews.text: Up and ready in minutes! I just had to put the shelves in at the heights I wanted. Beautiful sturdy and solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great product looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was will worth purchasing setup/move into house. These are assemble and large. Great workmanship
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, but the shelve holes was not continues ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, but the shelve holes was not continues throughout the the length of the case. This made it difficult to a commodity different book hight.
customer_reviews.author: Nagah M. Ramadan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bookcases! They are beautiful and well made! Lovely addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreview

customer_reviews.title: These bookcases look good and are very well built
customer_reviews.text: These bookcases look good and are very well built. I'm a librarian so I've seen my share of bookcases. I've bought 3 of these and 1 of the smaller ones. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Herndon

customer_reviews.title: The bookcase is very elegant and looks great in the room
customer_reviews.text: The bookcase is very elegant and looks great in the room. It is well made, sturdy and holds a lot of books!
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and solid
customer_reviews.text: Attractive bookcase for a home office. Quite solid and well built. I may purchase another one if I have room.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian A-Hole

customer_reviews.title: Having a 2 door cabinet to put under it would have made it perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well made bookcase. Having a 2 door cabinet to put under it would have made it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mypenname

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, very very tall!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, nice construction, obviously a solid piece. A good choice for you if you need one bookcase or several to make a library. HOWEVER, do be aware of the size, it is very, very tall, which I did not realize. It did not fit in our building's elevator, and I had to use it in my ground floor office which had not been my plan. If you live in a building with an elevator, this is probably too big. Stay with the same maker but go a size or two smaller.
customer_reviews.author: UES Reader

customer_reviews.title: Built using heavily pitted wood
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid bookshelf, but the wood from which it was constructed was heavily pitted, by termites from the looks of it. A little annoying, considering how much I paid for this, but it’s the only complaint that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F

customer_reviews.title: There was a gouge in the box
customer_reviews.text: While the product arrived damaged the hole in it was easy to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Linda gerchick

product_meta.title: Martin Furniture Huntington Oxford 84" Open Bookcase, Burnish Finish, Fully Assembled
product_meta.description: The Huntington Oxford collection incorporates a highly detailed finish with hand-applied distressing that includes rasping, wear sanding, dry brushing and pin holes to create texture and depth. This delivers a unique, special worn appearance of fine furniture that has withstood the test of time. The natural grain and beauty of the wood is enhanced by a multi-step, hand rubbed Burnish finish. Vertical fluting and dentil molding further add character and aesthetic appeal. The Bookcase features five adjustable shelves and two fixed for storage. Arrives fully assembled.
feature_bullets: Distressed hand applied Burnish finish that includes rasping, wear sanding, dry brushing and pin holes that are hand applied to give the piece character with its unique appearance.
Five adjustable shelves and two fixed for storage versatility
Fully assembled, Dimensions: 36" W x 13" D x 84" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
